entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
